amendatorysection.catchline: Commissioner of Education; duties; use of funds.
amendatorysection.para: The Commissioner of Education shall use the separate accounting provided by the State Treasurer under subdivision (1)(b) of section 79-1035 to determine the amount that is attributable to income from solar or wind agreements on school lands. This amount shall provide funds for the grants described in section 79-308 through the 2019-20 school year.
For purposes of this section, agreement means any lease, easement, covenant, or other such contractual arrangement.
